snippet.title: Shadows in Silence Official Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Shadows in Silence on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2626760/Shadows_in_Silence/

Shadows in Silence is a 4 vs 1 multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the killer - the witch Elliana and her cat named Sharm. And the other four players play as survivors trying to neutralize the killer.

Follow us on socials to support the game:

Shadows in Silence Discord:
https://discord.com/channels/1196374401629818931/1196374401629818937

Thank you! :)
